properties.Name: RecipeFormulaIngredientProperty
properties.Description: A property associated with the recipe formula ingredient.

Columns.Name: RecipeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a recipe.

Columns.Name: SequenceNumber
Columns.Description: The sequence in which the items are processed in the formula.

Columns.Name: IngredientId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Ingredient.

Columns.Name: IngredientPropertyTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Ingredient Property Type.

Columns.Name: RecipeFormulaIngredientPropertyNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the recipe formula ingredient property.
